passing_attributes.Mind Tricks: You use a mind trick to make the Imperials forget they saw you.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You skillfully hide behind debris, avoiding the search.

partial_pass_attributes.Intelligence: You manage to evade them, but they become suspicious.

fail.message: The Imperials spot you and capture you for questioning.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Hidden Knowledge                   |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| An ancient artifact lies buried in the sands of    |
| Jedha. Do you attempt to unearth it using your     |
| knowledge or brute strength?                       |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Intelligence: You cleverly analyze the surroundings and recover the artifact without damage.
passing_attributes.Strength: You use your physical power to pull the artifact from the ground.
passing_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You force push away the sands to unearth the artifact.

partial_pass_attributes.Dexterity: You uncover part of the artifact, but it's stuck.

fail.message: Your efforts fail, and the artifact remains buried.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Ancient Insight                    |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| A group of scavengers on Jedha offers to trade     |
| supplies, but they seem untrustworthy. Do you      |
| negotiate or prepare for a possible attack?        |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Intelligence: You outsmart the scavengers and secure a good deal.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You stay prepared and dissuade them from any hostile action.

partial_pass_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You sense their intent but aren't quick enough to act.

fail.message: The scavengers deceive you, and you lose valuable supplies and return to the entrance of the temple.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Secured Supplies                   |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| You've discovered a hidden chamber within the      |
| Temple of the Kyber. It contains powerful relics,  |
| but the energy is unstable. Do you attempt to      |
| stabilize the energy field or take a relic quickly?|
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You stabilize the energy field, allowing you to safely take a relic.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You override the energy systems to stabilize them temporarily.

partial_pass_attributes.Intelligence: You manage to take a relic, but the energy field fluctuates dangerously.

fail.message: The energy field destabilizes, and you are knocked back by a surge, but the scavengers come back while you are unconscious.

passing_attributes.Hacking: You successfully disable the temple's defenses and enter a hidden dock within the temple.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You manage to navigate through the defenses without triggering them and end up at a hidden empire dock within the temple.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You shoot some of the defenses but set off an alarm.

fail.message: You trigger the defenses and a group of stormtroopers capture you.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Deeper Access                      |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| You venture deeper into the Temple of the Kyber    |
| and discover a hidden archive. Do you study the    |
| ancient texts or search for hidden compartments?   |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Intelligence: You decipher the ancient texts, gaining invaluable knowledge about the Force and the plans of the star destroyer.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You skillfully find hidden compartments containing lost artifacts and plans of the star destroyer.

partial_pass_attributes.Force Sensitivity: You sense the presence of the Force but can't pinpoint its source; however, you end up finding a room with relics.

fail.message: You fail to decipher the texts and can't find any hidden compartments, so you move on into another room.

passing_attributes.Mind Tricks: You trick the guards into freeing you and make your escape into a strange room in the temple.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You override the locking mechanism on your cell and make your escape; as you turn a corner, you find yourself deeper into the temple.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: While the guards are distracted, you take out the blaster you have hidden and shoot the guards, but they injure you; you run away into the compound.

fail.message: You are interrogated ruthlessly and give up rebel secrets, but your friends come to save you. However, you lose ground and end up back where you started.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Gathering Info                     |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| Before making your move, you need more information  |
| about the Star Destroyer's patrols. Do you eavesdrop|
| on Imperial officers or analyze security feeds?    |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Intelligence: You cleverly analyze the feeds to gather valuable information.
passing_attributes.Mind Tricks: You use a mind trick to get an officer to reveal the patrol schedule.

partial_pass_attributes.Dexterity: You stealthily move to listen in but are spotted briefly.

fail.message: The officers catch you eavesdropping, and you must escape.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Intel Gathered                     |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| With the patrol schedule in hand, you plan your    |
| entry. Do you choose a stealthy approach through the|
| back alleys or create a diversion?                 |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Dexterity: You navigate the back alleys and reach the docking area undetected where you find your shuttle.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You create a diversion by firing at nearby equipment, drawing the guards away; this gives you time to get onboard the shuttle.

partial_pass_attributes.Hacking: You manage to set off a distraction, but it draws more attention than you anticipated.

fail.message: Your plan fails, and you're surrounded by guards.

passing_attributes.Hacking: You successfully hack into the Imperial systems to sabotage their ships.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You secure your ship and prepare to leave just as the alarms go off.

partial_pass_attributes.Dexterity: You manage to prepare your ship, but the guards are alerted.

fail.message: You are captured as you try to escape; however, you are not alone, and a hidden rebel team rescues you.

passing_attributes.Dexterity: You skillfully evade their shots and find a hiding spot.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You take cover and return fire, taking out a few troopers.

partial_pass_attributes.Mind Tricks: You attempt to confuse them but only buy yourself a moment.

fail.message: You are overwhelmed and captured by the stormtroopers.

passing_attributes.Hacking: You successfully bypass the terminal's security and launch the shuttle.
passing_attributes.Deception: You convince the guards that you’re authorized personnel.

partial_pass_attributes.Mind Tricks: You attempt a mind trick, but it only partially works.

fail.message: The terminal locks down, and alarms start blaring as guards rush in.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Successful Launch                   |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| The shuttle launches successfully, and you find     |
| yourself heading towards the Star Destroyer. Do you |
| take a direct approach or attempt to sneak in through|
| a lesser-known docking bay?                         |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Piloting: You expertly maneuver the shuttle, evading detection.
passing_attributes.Dexterity: You identify and approach a lesser-known docking bay that is less guarded.

partial_pass_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You engage in a dogfight with nearby TIE fighters but manage to evade them.

fail.message: Your approach is detected, and the Star Destroyer's defenses activate against you. You return back to the dock to land and attempt a new plan.

prompt_text:
+----------------------------------------------------+
|                 Docked Inside                      |
+----------------------------------------------------+
| You have docked inside the Star Destroyer. Your    |
| mission begins. Do you head for the control room or |
| look for a way to sabotage the ship?               |
+----------------------------------------------------+

passing_attributes.Intelligence: You quickly formulate a plan and lead your team to the control room.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You find systems to sabotage to weaken the Star Destroyer.

partial_pass_attributes.Mind Tricks: You use a mind trick to manipulate a guard, but it backfires slightly.

fail.message: You are spotted immediately, and alarms begin to sound.

passing_attributes.lightsaber_proficiency: You use your lightsaber to defeat the guards and take their suits to blend in on the Star Destroyer.
passing_attributes.Hacking: You hack the ship and lock out the guards before they reach you.
passing_attributes.Blaster Proficiency: You shoot the guards and end up leaving to the Star Destroyer before more guards are alerted.

partial_pass_attributes.Mind Tricks: You use a mind trick to manipulate a guard, but they see past the trick and incapacitate you to bring you to their superior on the Star Destroyer.

fail.message: You are spotted immediately and stormed off the ship as stormtroopers chase you!
